column1: High Warden of the White Tower is a Gondorian title borne at least by Boromir
column2: son of Denethor II. Boromirs brother Faramir told to Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee in Ithilien that Boromir was the High Warden of the Tower of Ecthelion

column1: It is not known what responsibilities belonged to the office of the High Warden
column2: or was it only a honorific title. No other bearers of the title are known. It is also possible that the title means the same as Captain of the White Tower
